mapper.select:
select * from( select null as noticenum, freenum, id, title, contents, inputdate, hits, heart, originalfile, savedfile, nickname, comments from tempcat_free union select noticenum,null as freenum, id, title, contents, inputdate, hits, heart, originalfile, savedfile, nickname, comments from tempcat_notice)
where upper(title) like '%' || upper(#{_parameter}) || '%'
order by inputdate desc

select noticenum, freenum, id, title, contents, to_char(inputdate, 'YY/MM/DD') inputdate, hits, originalfile, savedfile, nickname from ( select null as noticenum, freenum, id, title, contents, inputdate, hits, heart, originalfile, savedfile, nickname, comments from tempcat_free union select noticenum,null as freenum, id, title, contents, inputdate, hits, heart, originalfile, savedfile, nickname, comments from tempcat_notice)
where upper(title) like '%' || upper(#{_parameter}) || '%'
order by inputdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into request (name, email, category, message) values (#{name}, #{email}, #{category}, #{message})
